Serial¶

Dependencies¶

Requires the PySerial module installed on the system

Interface¶

class labtronyx.interfaces.i_Serial.i_Serial(manager)[source]¶
addResource(ResID, VID, PID)¶

Manually add a resource to the controller

Parameters:
  • ResID (str) – Resource Identifier
  • VID (str) – Vendor Identifier
  • PID (str) – Product Identifier
Returns:

bool - True if successful, False otherwise
destroyResource(ResID)¶

Remove a manually added resource

Parameters:ResID (str) – Resource Identifier
Returns:bool - True if successful, False otherwise
refresh()[source]¶

Scans system for new resources and creates resource objects for them.

run()¶

Interface thread
